metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Desktop Background Change Using Reg.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "reg.exe" to alter registry keys that would replace the user's desktop background. This is a common technique used by malware to change the desktop background to a ransom note or other image.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\reg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('reg.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('control panel\\desktop')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('currentversion\\policies\\activedesktop')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('currentversion\\policies\\system'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v nochangingwallpaper')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d 1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v wallpaper')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/t reg_sz')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v wallpaperstyle')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d 2'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "reg.exe" to alter registry keys that would replace the user's desktop background. This is a common technique used by malware to change the desktop background to a ransom note or other image.

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrative scripts that change the desktop background to a company logo or other image. References: https://www.attackiq.com/2023/09/20/emulating-rhysida/, https://research.checkpoint.com/2023/the-rhysida-ransomware-activity-analysis-and-ties-to-vice-society/, https://www.trendmicro.com/en_us/research/23/h/an-overview-of-the-new-rhysida-ransomware.html, https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/a864282fea5a536510ae86c77ce46f7827687783628e4f2ceb5bf2c41b8cd3c6/behavior, https://admx.help/?Category=Windows_10_2016&Policy=Microsoft.Policies.WindowsDesktop::Wallpaper, https://admx.help/?Category=Windows_10_2016&Policy=Microsoft.Policies.ControlPanelDisplay::CPL_Personalization_NoDesktopBackgroundUI
